title: Nami - BoTW Ver. Rough Sketch
body:
About a year ago, someone on the boards posted a picture of what Illaoi would look like if drawn in a Gerudo BotW style. It got me wondering if anyone had drawn either Nami or Fizz in the game's style as well. But, no one bothered to post anything.

So, a few months ago, I got bored and decided to do a rough sketch of Nami incorporating the BotW Zora style myself. 
I hope you guys like it.

replies.body: I love this so much!! ಥ⌣ಥ

if im being totally honest

i just see nami with a zora pendant
The artist should have gone all the way and given her feet.
You know, I thought the exact same thing while drawing her. I'll see what I can do to try incorporate feet.
I really do think it'll make the concept work much better.

Okay. I changed it. Not gonna lie; it does look better imo. Thanks for the suggestion.

https://imgur.com/i6ZtL4k
Looks more like a Zora to me

> [{quoted}](name=JPLangley,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=rAuEIBxB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-16T16:52:29.123+0000)
>
> if im being totally honest
> 
> i just see nami with a zora pendant

its mainly in the facial details were its shows the zora Botw art style
I agree. But it's still a beautiful Nami ^^
Next, draw {{champion:498}} {{champion:497}} as Ritos!

Thanks for the suggestion!
This was a bit tricky. I wasn't sure if the beaks would take away from their actual appearance.

Here you go.

https://imgur.com/lmpszZ2

I'm a simple man: I see Nami, I upvote.

Somewhere on this planet

Still need to finish the game. Just got to Zora's Domain and on the way to defeat Vah Ruta (Assuming I didn't do anything out of order after heading to Hateno village)
